channel.title: CVE Feed for Telos -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Telos -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-9542|2024-08-04T21:54:44.494Z -- telos -- automated%20message%20handling%20system
item.description: : Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in itemlookup.asp of Telos Automated Message Handling System allows a remote attacker to inject arbitrary script into an AMHS session. This issue affects: Telos Automated Message Handling System versions prior to 4.1.5.5.

item.title: CVE-2019-9538|2024-08-04T21:54:44.456Z -- telos -- automated%20message%20handling%20system
item.description: : Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in the LDAP cbURL parameter of Telos Automated Message Handling System allows a remote attacker to inject arbitrary script into an AMHS session. This issue affects: Telos Automated Message Handling System versions prior to 4.1.5.5.

item.title: CVE-2019-9540|2024-08-04T21:54:44.492Z -- telos -- automated%20message%20handling%20system
item.description: : Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in prefs.asp of Telos Automated Message Handling System allows a remote attacker to inject arbitrary script into an AMHS session. This issue affects: Telos Automated Message Handling System versions prior to 4.1.5.5.

item.description: : Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in uploaditem.asp of Telos Automated Message Handling System allows a remote attacker to inject arbitrary script into an AMHS session. item.description: : Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ModalWindowPopup.asp of Telos Automated Message Handling System allows a remote attacker to inject arbitrary script into an AMHS session. item.title: CVE-2019-9541|2024-08-04T21:54:44.457Z -- telos -- automated%20message%20handling%20system
item.description: : Information Exposure vulnerability in itemlookup.asp of Telos Automated Message Handling System allows a remote attacker to inject arbitrary script into an AMHS session. This issue affects: Telos Automated Message Handling System versions prior to 4.1.5.5.
